title: Poison and Papyrus
description: Murder in the ivy-covered ivory tower. A famous Classicist, Augustus Biermeier, is found mysteriously poisoned . . . just as a recently discovered fragment of Homer is set to overturn centuries of scholarship. The Classical world is in an uproar as fortunes and reputations hang in the balance and murder stalks the halls of academia. But the cryptic papyrus is a forgery. When Magnolia Henley stumbles onto the truth, death and danger follow hand in hand. Magnolia and her mentor Marshall Wheelock must race to try and solve the mystery and bring the perpetrator to justice before falling victim to Biermeier's fate. A Magnolia Henley cozy murder mystery.
author: Betty Younis
